errors.noPermsDescription: You need the `ADMINISTRATOR` permission or be in the list of allowed roles!
errors.noPermsDelete: Only admins can delete a ticket!
errors.chooseFromListDescription: Choose one of the id's below:
errors.notInTicketTitle: You are not in a ticket!
errors.notInTicketDescription: This command doesn't work outside tickets!
errors.anotherOption: This option is not a ticket but another type!
errors.maxAmountDescription:
You reached the maximum number of tickets allowed!
So you can't create a new one!
errors.somethingWentWrong:
**Something went wrong!**
Please try again another time!

commands.autocloseTitle: This ticket will be closed automatically after {0}!
commands.autocloseRejectTitle: This ticket will no longer be closed automatically!
commands.ticketWarning: The embed is in the message below!
commands.maxTicketWarning: **Warning:** _You can only create {0} ticket(s) at a time!_

helpMenu.title: Available Commands:
helpMenu.header2: **Run the command `/new` or `/ticket` to create a ticket!**
helpMenu.msgCmd: Spawn an embed with buttons. (admins only)
helpMenu.addCmd: Add a user to the ticket.
helpMenu.removeCmd: Remove a user from the ticket.
helpMenu.reopenCmd: Re-Open a ticket after it was closed.
helpMenu.autocloseCmd: Set timer to automatically close ticket

messages.closedDescription:
Only admins can talk in this ticket now!

*Click on the button below to delete or to re-open this ticket!*
messages.createdDescription: Your ticket is created, you can detect it by a ping!
messages.modalreason: What is the reason for closing this ticket?
